meanings.definition: A type of leguminous plant grown for forage.
meanings.sent1: Farmers plant lucernes to feed their animals.
meanings.sent2: The lucernes in the field are ready to be harvested.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cow bring a basket of lucernes to the picnic?
meanings.sent4: The lucernes swayed gently in the breeze, like a green ocean.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the lucernes brightened up the farm.

meanings.sent1: Many tourists visit Lucernes to see the beautiful lake.
meanings.sent2: Lucernes is known for its picturesque old town.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cheese from Lucernes tell jokes? Because it was so hole-y!
meanings.sent4: The lights of Lucernes shimmered like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The history of Lucernes is as rich as its chocolate.

meanings.sent1: The farmer stored the lucernes in the barn for winter.
meanings.sent2: The horses happily munched on the sweet lucernes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the scarecrow refuse to eat the lucernes? Because he was stuffed!
meanings.sent4: The scent of fresh lucernes filled the air, bringing back memories of summer.
meanings.sent5: The lucernes were neatly stacked in the corner of the field, waiting to be baled.
